JChatServerProtocol

public JChatServerProtocol(JClientConnection c,
                           List l,
                           TextArea ta)
Parameterized constructor for the class JChatServerProtocol.

Parameters:
c - Specifies the client connection object retrieved from the class JChatServerProtocol.
l - Client List, which signifies the current active client list.
ta - Specifies TextArea in order to display the notices, messages, conversations.
Method Detail

addNick

public boolean addNick(String user,
                       JClientConnection c)
This method signifies the addition of user to server's authenticated user's list.

Parameters:
user - Specifies the user name to be added.
c - Specifies the client connection object of the particular client.
Returns:
It returns a boolean value.

authenticate

public String authenticate(String msg)
This method authenticates the user, in case of a new user.

Parameters:
msg - Specifies the message received from client in order to carry forward authentication process.
Returns:
It returns a response string.

isAuthenticated

public boolean isAuthenticated()
This method if the user is authenticated with server.

Returns:
It returns a boolean value.

processInput

public String processInput(String msg)
This method processes the data forwarded by the JClientConnection class which was in turn sent by client.

Parameters:
msg - Specifies the data string which contains information.
Returns:
It returns a string containing information about authentication of client.

sendMsg

public void sendMsg(String reciever,
                    String msg)
This method verifies the existence of recipient user in active user's list, if so it sends the message.

Parameters:
reciever - Specifies the recipient of message.
msg - Specifies the message to be sent.
